Installation
==============

In order to install the AddOn, you have to first clone the Blender repository

``git clone https://github.com/genn-team/neuron_visualisation.git``

Next, you can install it in your Blender by selecting ``File>User Preferences...>Add-ons>Install Add-on from File...`` and pointing to ``__init__.py`` inside the ``neuron_visualisation\neuron_visualization_addon`` folder.

.. image:: img\\screen2.png
   :width: 250px
   :height: 250px
   :alt: alternate text
   :align: center


Make sure that you enabled that AddOn by checking the checkbox next it.

Additionally, you need to install the dependencies:
https://libneuroml.readthedocs.io/en/latest/install.html
